abstract: A Sunday puzzle from Australia introduces us to the Foreman family.
snippet: A Sunday puzzle from Australia introduces us to the Foreman family.
lead_paragraph: You never know what you’re going to learn by doing crosswords. The former world heavyweight boxing champion George Foreman has five sons. Their names are George Jr., George III, George IV, George V, and George VI. Perhaps all that knocking around interferes with the cranial creativity capacity too.
